channel.title: Gallio Automation Platform
channel.description: News and information about the Gallio Automation Platform for .NET

item.title: Gallio.org adds RSS Feed
item.description: Gallio.org the official website of the Gallio Automation Platform today added an RSS feed to its website www.gallio.org. The feed will include news items about releases and other items of import relating to Gallio, including updates to the website and any blogs or articles of note.

item.title: Jeff Brown blogs about Gallio v3 Alpha 2
item.description: "Today we have released Gallio v3.0 Alpha 2, including a preview of MbUnit v3. There's been a ton of work behind the scenes to provide a compelling model for data-driven testing. Here's an example of this feature in action. Notice the use of generic method parameters. Also notice that we perform an automatic string to DateTime conversion and that we take some care in how we format the parameters for presentation in the test results..." Read more at Jeff's blog...

item.title: Gallio Alpha 2 released.
item.description: Today we released Alpha 2. New features include MbUnit data-binding, the complete realization of the Gallio test model, and integrated support for ReSharper, PowerShell, NCover, TypeMock, Pex and ASP.NET MVC. Continued improvements to Echo, Icarus, the installer, and all other tools are also a part of this release.

item.title: Gallio.org launches on the web
item.description: The Gallio Project, an open-source Automation Platform for .NET launched it's official website today. News and information about the Gallio Automation Platform is available on the website. The site also features a convenient "out toolbar" that provide quick access to various Gallio Project development resources, such as the google-code repository and wiki, as well as the gallio-dev google group site. Over the next few months a full API reference will be added, as well as turorials and articles.
